results.name: Continued fraction for e/2.
reference: D. E. Knuth, The Art of Computer Programming. Addison-Wesley, Reading, MA, Vol. 2, p. 601.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,1,0,0,1,0,0,-1).
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 55000); x=contfrac(exp(1)/2); for (n=1, 20000, write("b006083.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 10 2009
xref: Cf. A019739 = Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, May 10 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Jeffrey Shallit_
